color.description: Color of the chart items. Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, blue.6 by default.
color.description_zh: 图表项目的颜色。theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，默认为 blue.6。

dataKey *.description: Data keys for x, y and z axis
dataKey *.description_zh: x、y 和 z 轴的数据键

gridColor.description: Color of the grid and cursor lines, by default depends on color scheme
gridColor.description_zh: 网格和光标线的颜色，默认情况下取决于配色方案

label.description: Chart label displayed next to the x axis
label.description_zh: x 轴旁边显示的图表标签

scatterProps.description: Props passed down to the Scatter component
scatterProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 Scatter 组件的 props

textColor.description: Color of the text displayed inside the chart, 'dimmed' by default
textColor.description_zh: 图表内显示的文本颜色，默认为 'dimmed'

tooltipProps.description: Props passed down to the Tooltip component
tooltipProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 Tooltip 组件的 props

valueFormatter.description: Function to format z axis values
valueFormatter.description_zh: 格式化 z 轴值的函数

withTooltip.description: Determines whether the tooltip should be displayed, true by default
withTooltip.description_zh: 确定是否应显示工具提示，默认为 true

xAxisProps.description: Props passed down to the XAxis recharts component
xAxisProps.description_zh: 传递给 XAxis recharts 组件的 props

yAxisProps.description: Props passed down to the YAxis recharts component
yAxisProps.description_zh: 传递给 YAxis recharts 组件的 props

zAxisProps.description: Props passed down to the ZAxis recharts component
zAxisProps.description_zh: 传递给 ZAxis recharts 组件的 props
